page.title: 02 HOUSING IN BLACKBURN (1)
page.content: 15 Woodstock Crescent is a semi-detached house on the Beechwood Estate. The house was built approximately 14 years ago. The houses on this road are almost all the same but there are a few bungalows and detached houses. This house is on the corner of the road and has a front, side and back garden. The front garden is small and the side and back gardens are average. The front and side gardens are surrounded by a hedge, the back is partioned off by a fence. There is a garage at the back of the garden. The house has six rooms - lounge/dining area, kitchen, bathroom, three bedrooms. It also has a hallway. There are four windows at the front, one at the side and four at the back.
